## isNumberInRange() function

n is in range \[minimum, maximum\] range is inclusive

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNumberInRange(n: number, minimum: number, maximum: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> | number to test |
|  minimum | <code>number</code> | minimum that n can be |
|  maximum | <code>number</code> | maximum that n can be |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
